Haircut percentage is the percentage difference between market value of the Loan Security and the value ascribed to that Loan Security when used as collateral for that loan.

Leave blank if no upper limit
Link to parent product if this is a sub-product. Leave blank for main products.
Loan To Value Ratio expresses the ratio of the loan amount to the value of the security pledged. A loan security shortfall will be triggered if this falls below the specified value for any loan
Loan Write Off will be automatically created on loan closure request if pending amount is below this limit
Loan is a Non Performing Asset
Loans will be marked as NPA when the days past due count exceed this threshold
Marketing selling points for this product
Maximum debt service ratio allowed (e.g., 40% means monthly debt payments cannot exceed 40% of income)
Maximum loan amount as multiple of monthly income (e.g., 10 means max loan = 10x monthly income)

Maximum vehicle age allowed (leave blank for no limit)
